products.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Thermoblock Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Their exclusive thermoblock range combines blackout and thermal properties in a range of soft neutral colours. A white roller blind easily freshens up the space. Their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This white blackout roller also features a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms.

products.title: Willow Blackout Birch White Roller Blind
products.description: Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate willow blackout birch white electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area. It blends well with most neutral dcor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space. Finished with pollergen, it is a good option for hayfever sufferers as it neutralises pollen so reducing symptoms. The electric operation is easy to use and the blind opens and closes at the touch of a button.
